author: Krishna Thevar
title: Maharashtra extends lockdown at least till April 30
description: Maharashtra extends lockdown at least till April 30Making the announcement, Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray said that the lockdown can be relaxed in certain areas while on others it will become stricter.
content:
Maharashtra Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray on Saturday announced that the state will extend the lockdown till at least April 30 and asked people to be "mentally prepared" for a longer wait if the situation did not ease by then.
“The lockdown will be extende… [+1934 chars]
